data.name: Privacy policy overview text
data.value: This Privacy Policy describes how TriathlonTracker collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our triathlon tracking service.

data.name: Personal Information
data.value: Personal Information

data.name: Personal information collection details
data.value: We collect basic personal information including your name, email address, and account preferences to provide our services.

data.name: Training Data
data.value: Training Data

data.name: Training data collection details
data.value: We collect your triathlon race data including distances, times, locations, and performance metrics to track your progress.

data.name: Usage Data
data.value: Usage Data

data.name: Usage data collection details
data.value: We collect information about how you use our application to improve our services and user experience.

data.name: Data use explanation
data.value: We use your data for the following purposes:

data.name: Service provision
data.value: To provide and maintain our triathlon tracking service

data.name: Performance analysis
data.value: To analyze your performance and provide insights

data.name: User support
data.value: To provide customer support and respond to inquiries

data.name: Service improvement
data.value: To improve our services and develop new features

data.name: Data sharing policy
data.value: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your data only in specific circumstances:

data.name: Third-Party Service Providers
data.value: Third-Party Service Providers

data.name: Third-party service providers explanation
data.value: We may share data with trusted service providers who assist us in operating our service, such as hosting providers and analytics services.

data.name: Legal Requirements
data.value: Legal Requirements

data.name: Legal requirements explanation
data.value: We may disclose your information if required by law or to protect our rights and safety.

data.name: User rights explanation
data.value: Under GDPR and other privacy laws, you have several rights regarding your personal data:

data.name: Right to Access
data.value: Right to Access

data.name: Right to access explanation
data.value: You have the right to request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.

data.name: Right to Rectification
data.value: Right to Rectification

data.name: Right to rectification explanation
data.value: You have the right to request correction of inaccurate or incomplete personal data.

data.name: Right to Erasure
data.value: Right to Erasure

data.name: Right to erasure explanation
data.value: You have the right to request deletion of your personal data in certain circumstances.

data.name: Security measures explanation
data.value: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

data.name: Contact information text
data.value: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer.

data.name: Contact DPO
data.value: Contact DPO
